title: Role Resolution: How the Team Instance is Built
summary: Order: Team Template → Lifecycle Template → Context Team → Workflow; team instances are not retro‑updated.

steps.label: Build order
steps.action: When a process starts, resolve roles: (1) Team Template adds roles/participants; (2) Lifecycle adds roles; (3) Context Team augments participants for existing roles; (4) Workflow adds missing process roles.
steps.verify: Team instance lists only roles from TT/LCT/WF; CT augments users but does not add roles.

steps.label: No retro‑update
steps.action: Changing templates later does not rewrite an existing team instance; update via Setup Participants or object details.
steps.verify: Existing instances remain unchanged after template edits.
